sentences.en: If the quality of food eaten is good, then the excreta is comparitively easier to tolerate.
sentences.cn: 如果吃的是优质食物，那么排泄物就相对容易忍受。

sentences.en: Nitrogen turnover from grazing livestock excreta is the key process in the nitrogen cycle of pasture ecosystems.
sentences.cn: 放牧家畜排泄物氮转化是草原生态系统氮循环的关键。

sentences.en: The excreta not because of weightlessness, but will scatter to the installment outside.
sentences.cn: 排泄物就不会因为失重, 而散落到装置以外.

sentences.en: The excreta of humans and land animals contain soluble refractory organic matter.
sentences.cn: 人和陆生动物排泄物含有可溶的难处理有机物质。

words.tran_cn: 排泄的，分泌的；有排泄功能的
排泄，排泄物；分泌，分泌物

trans.tran_en: the solid or liquid waste material that people and animals produce and get rid of from their bodies
